00052 class NTBP_channels_current_o : public NTBP_membrane_current_o {
00053 public:
00054 /***   Constructors, Copy/Assignment and Destructor  ***/  
00055 NTBP_channels_current_o(
00056     NTreal reversalPotential, // in mV
00057     NTreal density, // channels per mumeter^2
00058     NTreal area, // in mumeter^2
00059     NTreal conductivity // in mSiemens per channel
00060     );
00061 NTBP_channels_current_o(const NTBP_channels_current_o & original);
00062 const NTBP_channels_current_o & operator= (const NTBP_channels_current_o & right);
00063 virtual ~NTBP_channels_current_o();
00064 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00065 /* mementary total conductance */
00066 NTreal _density() const { return density;}
00067 NTreal _area()  const { return area; }
00068 /* conductivity per channel */
00069 NTreal _conductivity() const { return conductivity; } /* in mSiemens per channel */
00070 /* conductivity if all channels open in mSiemens/cm^2 */
00071 NTreal _maxConductivity() const {return density*conductivity*1e-8;}
00073 bool ComputeGillespieStep() { return channelsPtr->GillespieStep();}
00074 NTreal ComputeConductance(){ return Set_conductance( channelsPtr->NumOpen() * conductivity);}
00075 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00076 protected:
00077 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00078 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00079 NTBP_ion_channels_o * channelsPtr;
00080 NTreal density; // channels per mumeter^2
00081 NTreal area; // in mumeter^2
00082 NTreal conductivity; // in mSiemens per channel
00083 private:
00084 /* ***  Methods              ***/  
00085 /* ***  Data                 ***/ 
00086 };
